faq.subtitle: Pricing FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our pricing and plans.

items.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
items.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any billing differences.

items.question: What happens if I exceed my monthly transformation limit?
items.answer: Don't worry! We'll notify you when you're approaching your limit. You can either upgrade your plan or purchase additional transformations at $0.50 each.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all plans. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 14 days for a full refund.

items.question: Are there any hidden fees or setup costs?
items.answer: No hidden fees! The price you see is what you pay. No setup costs, no cancellation fees, no surprises.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings. Your plan remains active until the end of your billing period.

items.question: Do you offer annual plans or discounts?
items.answer: Yes! Annual plans save you 20%. We also offer special discounts for students, non-profits, and volume customers. Contact us for details.
